data.name: CheckCSRNote
data.value: Use this CSR Decoder to decode your Certificate Signing Request and and verify that it contains the correct information. A Certificate Signing Request is a block of encoded text that contains information about the company that an SSL certificate will be issued to and the SSL public key. Once a CSR is created it is difficult to verify what information is contained in it because it is encoded. Since certificate authorities use the information in CSRs to create the certificate, you need to decode CSRs to make sure the information is accurate. To check CSRs and view the information inside of them, simply paste your CSR into the box below and the AJAX CSR Decoder will do the rest. Your CSR should start with "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST----- " and end with "-----ENDCERTIFICATE REQUEST----- ".

data.name: Checkout_Desc
data.value: Your order details will be sent to this email address.

data.name: CheckOut_Note
data.value: Please review and submit your order by selecting "Confirm".

data.name: CheckSSLNote
data.value: This SSL Checker will help you diagnose problems with your SSL certificate installation. You can verify the SSL certificate on your web server to make sure it is correctly installed, valid, trusted and doesn't give any errors to any of your users. To use the SSL Checker, simply enter your server's hostname (must be public) in the boxbelow and click the Submit button

data.name: Comodo_Code_Signing_Certificates_Desc
data.value: Code Signing, through the use of digital signatures, enables software developers to include information about themselves and their code with their software. Your end users who download digitally signed 32-bit or 64-bit Portable Executable (.exe, .ocx, .dll or other) or .cab files can be confident that code really comes from you and has not been altered or corrupted since it was created and signed.

data.name: Comodo_Essential_SSL_Desc
data.value: Issued within 10 minutes, an Essential SSL Certificate provides a quick cost-effective solution to secure your customer transactions. More importantly, your customers are assured that it is safe to do business with you because sensitive information is encrypted and remains private.

data.name: Comodo_Essential_SSL_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: 128-bit SSL certificates designed for encrypting web sites that handle low-volume online transactions. Trusted by over 99.3% of current Internet users, Essential SSL is the solution for new web sites or environments where trust has been established and entity verification (for identity assurance) is not needed.

data.name: Comodo_EV_SSL_Desc
data.value: EV SSL Certificates provide the highest levels of encryption, security and trust. They immediately reassure web site visitors that it is safe to conduct online transactions by turning the address bar green on next generation browsers such as Internet Explorer 7 +, FireFox 3 + and Opera 9.5 +.

data.name: Comodo_EV_SSL_EV_SGC_Desc
data.value: Guard sensitive customer information, financial transactions and transmit confidential data with identity assured Extended Validation (EV) SGC SSL Certificates. These certificates provide 128- or 256-bit encryption to over 99% of Web site visitors by offering the strongest encryption and identity assurance available to every site visitor - even the millions using older versions of Windows and IE.

data.name: Comodo_EV_SSL_Multi_Domain_Desc
data.value: Multi-Domain EV SSL Certificates (EV MDCs) allow you to secure up to 100 different domains or sub-domains with a single SSL certificate. EV technology adds an additional layer of trust to your online business by turning the browser address bar green every time one of your customers enters the secure area of your web site.

data.name: Comodo_Instant_SSL_Desc
data.value: InstantSSL Certificates enable you and your customers to complete transactions with the assurance that no one else can read or change information as it travels over the Internet. This leads to increased visitor conversion rate, lower web site abandonment and an increase in average purchase price.

data.name: Comodo_Instant_SSL_Premium_Desc
data.value: InstantSSL Premium Certificates are the professional solution for securing ecommerce web sites and provide compelling visual assurance that your web site can be trusted. InstantSSL Premium Certificates enable your customers to complete transactions with the assurance.

data.name: Comodo_Instant_SSL_Pro_Desc
data.value: An InstantSSL Pro Certificate enables you and your customers to complete transactions with the assurance that no one else can read or change information as it travels over the Internet. This leads to increased visitor conversion rate, lower web site abandonment and an increase in average purchase price.

data.name: Comodo_Multi_Domain_Desc
data.value: Multi-domain certificates (MDC) are your solutions for securing anywhere from two to 100 domains on the same server under one SSL certificate. Consolidate your SSL management process and manage the SSL encryption for all of your domains under just one SSL certificate for multiple domains. You can start by implementing a Comodo Multi-Domain SSL Certificate.

data.name: Comodo_Positive_SSL_Desc
data.value: Issued within 10 minutes, a Positive SSL Certificate provides a quick cost-effective solution to secure your customer transactions. More importantly, your customers are assured that it is safe to do business with you because sensitive information is encrypted and remains private.

data.name: Comodo_Positive_SSL_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: 128 bit-SSL certificates designed for encrypting web sites that handle low-volume online transactions. Trusted by over 99.3% of current Internet users, Positive SSL is the solution for new web sites or environments where trust has been established and entity verification (for identity assurance) is not needed. Positive SSL Certificates carry a $10,000 warranty.

data.name: Comodo_Premium_SSL_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: Comodo's Premium SSL Wildcards secure unlimited sub-domains on your site such as www.yourdomain.com, secure.yourdomain.com and mail.yourdomain.com. One Premium SSL Wildcard Certificate saves you money and time by simplifying SSL certificate management. Use a single certificate to secure all of your sub-domains.

data.name: Comodo_SGC_Desc
data.value: Comodo SGC SSL Certificates upgrade the encryption capabilities of older browsers from 40-bit encryption into full 128- or 256-bit encryption. This means your website protects and is trusted by the highest number of internet users possible, even the millions using older versions of Windows and Internet Explorer.

data.name: Comodo_SGC_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: Secure unlimited sub-domains on your website with a single Comodo SGC Wildcard SSL Certificate (e.g. www.yourdomain.com, secure.yourdomain.com, signup.yourdomain.com). A Comodo SGC Wildcard SSL Certificate is a cost effective and efficient means of securing all sub-domains without the need to manage multiple certificates.

data.name: Comodo_Unified_Communication_UC_Desc
data.value: Designed exclusively for Microsoft Exchange and Office Communications infrastructures, Comodo's Unified Communications Certificates allow a single certificate to provide SSL-secured communications for multiple domains and multiple host names operating on a single IP address.

data.name: Dashboard_Note
data.value: Please configure the following items before your site goes Live.

data.name: Dashboard_Notice1
data.value: Configure Products & its pricing.

data.name: Dashboard_Notice2
data.value: Configure your payment settings.

data.name: Dashboard_Notice3
data.value: Configure your SMTP settings to be able to send out emails from the system.

data.name: Enable_Test_Mode
data.value: Enable Test Mode

data.name: GeoTrust_QuickSSL_Premium_Desc
data.value: GeoTrust QuickSSL Premium certificates are the most convenient and cost effective solution for any business that needs to conduct secure online transactions. These certificates enable up to 256-bit encryption and instill confidence and trust in your customers and business partners when providing sensitive information over the Web or mobile devices.

data.name: GeoTrust_True_BusinessID_Desc
data.value: GeoTrust® True BusinessID® certificates provide end-to-end Internet security coverage and are ideal for high-profile, high-traffic sites that are likely to be targets for phishing. True BusinessID certificate enables up to 256-bit encryption and an identity verification seal in a single bundle.

data.name: GeoTrust_True_BusinessID_Multi_Domain_Desc
data.value: With a True BusinessID Multi-Domain certificate, you can add, edit, or delete up to 25 domain names over the lifetime of the certificate. You can add, edit or delete any additional domain names to the subject alt name (SAN) field during the enrollment process.

data.name: GeoTrust_True_BusinessID_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: True BusinessID Wildcard is the easy, affordable solution. True BusinessID Wildcard is an ideal solution if you need to secure multiple Fully Qualified Domains that share the same base domain name, reside on the same physical server and share the same second-level domain name.

data.name: GeoTrust_True_BusinessID_with_EV_Desc
data.value: EV SSL can help you to protect your site from phishing scams and increase your customer transactions. True BusinessID with EV comes with the highest levels of identity authentication, up to 256-bit encryption, and the GeoTrust True Site® seal.

data.name: GeoTrust_True_Business_ID_With_EV_Multi_Domain_Desc
data.value: Make a strong security statement with the green address bar. GeoTrust® True BusinessID with EV (Extended Validation) Multi-Domain is our premium business-class SSL security product, visually confirming the highest level of authentication available among SSL certificates.

data.value: We thank you for your business.

data.name: RapidSSL_Desc
data.value: RapidSSL is industry standard 128 / 256 bit single root SSL certificate. RapidSSL certificates have browser recognition of around 99% including IE 5.01+, Netscape 4.7+ and Mozilla 1+ browsers and many other browsers.

data.name: RapidSSL_Desc1
data.value: RapidSSL is industry standard 128 / 256 bit single root SSL certificate. RapidSSL certificates have browser recognition of around 99% including IE 5.01+, Netscape 4.7+ and Mozilla 1+ browsers and many other browsers.

data.name: RapidSSL_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: RapidSSL Wildcard Certificates allows you to secure unlimited number of sub domains on the same domain name with a single certificate. RapidSSL Wildcard is low cost and easy to manage.

data.value: Sign in to your

data.name: Thawte_Code_Signing_Certificate_Desc
data.value: With the advent of online distribution, developing and disseminating functional code is easier than ever. However, such an environment also subjects code and software to potential dangers presented by fraudulent and malicious code. Don’t expose your customers to these threats. With a Thawte® Code Signing Certificate, you can protect your customers and provide them with the safe, trustworthy code they deserve.

data.name: Thawte_SGC_SuperCerts_Desc
data.value: Thawte® SGC SuperCert provides SGC SSL certificates with full authentication, and capable of 256-bit encryption with lowest possible encryption level of 128-bit protection for 99.9% of users even with older browsers and browser recognition of around 99%.

data.name: Thawte_SSL_123_Desc
data.value: SSL123 is Thawte's entry level certificate which provides validation that your domain is registered and that you have authorized the purchase of the certificate.

data.name: Thawte_SSL_Web_Server_Desc
data.value: Thawte® SSL Web Server Certificate is fully authenticated SSL certificates which offers comprehensive authentication procedures with 256, 128, 56 or 40-bit encryption and browser recognition of around 99%.

data.name: Thawte_SSL_Web_Server_EV_Desc
data.value: Thawte's SSL Web Server Certificate with Extended Validation (EV) offers corporations and government entities the highest industry standard for identity authentication as well as 256-, 128-, 56-, or 40-bit encryption.

data.name: Thawte_SSL_Web_Server_Wildcard_Desc
data.value: Thawte SSL Webserver Wildcard is an easy, affordable solution if you need to secure multiple fully qualified domains that share the same base domain name, reside on the same physical server, and share the same second level domain name.

data.name: TrustKeeper_PCI_DSS_Desc
data.value: Trustwave PCI Product protect the transfer of sensitive data on Web sites, intranets, and extranets using a minimum of 40-bit and up to 256-bit encryption (the highest that each individual browser will allow). It also includes the Trustwave Secured Seal.

data.name: TrustKeeper_Plus_EV_SSL_Desc
data.value: EV SSL Certificates are validated to the highest degree to provide consumer confidence in the identity of the web site operator. If you are taking orders online, you need to get the green bar with EV SSL. Customers will receive the green bar as a striking trust indicator in the web browser, and you will see fewer abandoned shopping carts and more conversions.

data.name: TrustKeeper_SSL_Plus_Desc
data.value: Trustwave understands the pressure merchants are under to prove compliance with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS). TrustKeeper is a certified remote assessment and compliance solution designed to help merchants meet the security standards of all credit card companies.

data.name: Trustwave_Domain_Validated_SSL_Desc
data.value: Trustwave Domain Validated Certificates are best suited for small and medium capital e-commerce web sites. Domain Validated Certificates offer 99% desktop and server browser compatibility with up to 256 bit SSL encryption and 204- bit CSR encryption.

data.name: Trustwave_Enterprise_SSL_Desc
data.value: Are you an Enterprise looking for our highest warranty? Trustwave Enterprise SSL Certificates provide everything you will need to protect a single domain and assure your customers that your site is trustworthy and secure with our highest Relying Party Warranty on a standard SSL certificate.

data.name: Trustwave_Premium_EV_SSL_Desc
data.value: EV SSL Certificates are validated to the highest degree to provide consumer confidence in the identity of the web site operator. If you are taking orders online, you need to get the green bar with EV SSL. Customers will receive the green bar as a striking trust indicator in the web browser, and you will see fewer abandoned shopping carts and more conversions.

data.name: Trustwave_Premium_SSL_Desc
data.value: Do you need to secure a single server domain name? Trustwave Premium SSL Certificates provide everything you will need to protect a single domain and assure your customers that your site is trustworthy and secure. Every Trustwave SSL Certificate includes a dynamic security site seal to give your customers confidence in your identity and feel safe in doing business with you.

data.name: Trustwave_Premium_Wildcard_SSL_Desc
data.value:
"Do you need to secure multiple server sub-domain names? Trustwave Premium Wildcard SSL Certificates provide a quick and easy way to protect multiple sub-domain names and assure your customers that your site is trustworthy and secure. You can use a Trustwave Wildcard SSL certificate to secure domains such as: www.mycompany.com, mail.mycompany.com, secure.mycompany.com and more! Every Trustwave SSL Certificate includes a dynamic security site seal to give your customers confidence in your identity and feel safe in doing business with you.
The Trustwave Premium Wildcard SSL Certificate features 256-Bit encryption, and includes a $100,000 identification guarantee and a 30 day, no questions asked, money back policy. All our certificates come with free reissues for the life of the certificate
Free Reissues For Life Trustwave offers you free SSL certificate reissues for any reason. Did your server crash and you lost your private key? Simply login to the Trustwave SSL Control Center and you can quickly reissue your certificate so you're back in business with minimal downtime.
Satisfaction Guarantee Trustwave offers a 30 day money back guarantee. If for any reason you're not satisfied with your SSL certificate, just let us know and we will refund your purchase price. It's Simple, customer satisfaction is our main goal. "

data.name: Trustwave_Secure_Email_Digital_ID_Desc
data.value: Trustwave Secure E-Mail Digital IDs allow you and your organization to secure your email communications in a cost-effective manner. With this certificate, you can ensure the privacy of both your email messages and attachments quickly and effortlessly.

data.name: UsePaypal
data.value: Use Your PayPal Email Address!

data.name: UserProfile_Desc
data.value: Please review the information on this page, When you have completed this review, please submit your order for processing

data.name: VeriSign_Code_Signing_Certificate_Desc
data.value: For developers and software publishers of active content, code signing reduces error messages and builds trust. VeriSign® Code Signing Certificates for Microsoft® Authenticode® authenticate your identity and validate code integrity

data.name: VeriSign_Secure_Site_Desc
data.value: A VeriSign Secure Site SSL certificate provides a minimum of 40-bit up to 256-bit encryption and more than 99% browser recognition. It also includes a $100,000 warranty and the VeriSign Secured Seal.

data.name: VeriSign_Secure_Site_Pro_Desc
data.value: VeriSign Secure Site Pro SSL Certificate provides 128-bit encryption. Secure Site Pro is enabled by Server Gated Cryptography (SGC) to help ensure strong encryption site visitors.

data.name: VeriSign_Secure_Site_Pro_SGC_Desc
data.value: A VeriSign Secure Site Pro SSL certificate provides 128-bit encryption. Secure Site Pro is enabled by Server Gated Cryptography (SGC) to help ensure strong encryption for site visitors. It also includes a $250,000 warranty and the VeriSign Secured Seal.

data.name: VeriSign_Secure_Site_Pro_with_EV_Desc
data.value: A VeriSign Secure Site Pro with EV SSL certificate provides a minimum of 128-bit up to 256-bit encryption and more than 99% browser recognition.

data.name: VeriSign_Secure_Site_with_EV_Desc
data.value: VeriSign Secure Site with EV SSL Certificate provides minimum of 40-bit and up to 256-bit encryption and more than 99% browser recognition. It also includes a $100,000 warranty and the VeriSign Secured Seal.

data.name: VeriSign_Trust_Seal_Desc
data.value: Trust turns visitors into customers, develops repeat business and increases sales. The VeriSign Trust™ Seal helps to bring trust to your web site by authenticating your business, protecting it from malware and increasing its recognition and confidence by displaying the VeriSign brand.

data.value: All prices are in

data.value: If you have any questions concerning this invoice, contact us at

data.name: Thanks_biz_msg
data.value: We thank you for your business.

data.name: Banner_Note
data.value: To change banner image just select any banner image and click on "Insert/edit Image" icon and upload your own new banner(s). Please use 960px X 150px(width X height)

data.name: Partner_Pricing_Caption_1
data.value: Our Partner program is based on loyalty, just like a Frequent Flyer program. The more you sell (or buy) the more you save. And it’s all cumulative. We will add all your purchases up and as soon as you reach the next level you automatically receive the additional discounts associated with the higher level tier. Never expires and continues to add on as you keep selling.

data.name: Partner_Pricing_Caption_2
data.value: What’s even better is, we’ll give you access to the higher tiers immediately! Simply either show us your receipts for SSL purchases over the past 2 years or make a deposit to your account. Either way, we will grant you the associated level.

data.name: Free_SSL_Desc
data.value: The FreeSSL security certificate is a fully functional security certificate with a term of 30 days, available completely free of charge. This trial SSL certificate allows you to try before you buy. Since FreeSSL uses the same exact technology as a RapidSSL certificate (a Symantec subsidiary), you can use it to test RapidSSL before live implementation.

data.name: GeotrustAntiMalware_Desc
data.value: Never let your site get hacked again, protect you and your potential customers. You can now add some trust and protect your customer's online interests with a cost-effective daily anti-malware scan.

data.name: UseMoneybookers
data.value: Use Your Moneybookers Email Address!

data.name: GeoTrust_QuickSSL_Premium_multiDomain_Desc
data.value: Secure 4 Additional Domains with a Single GeoTrust QuickSSL Premium SAN Certificate GeoTrust, one of the world’s most trusted SSL brand, delivers a SAN/Multi-Domain solution with a fast issuing process at very low cost. GeoTrust now offers their popular QuickSSL Premium certificate with SAN enabled.
